title: Exception thrown when exporting data from table containing highlight/map
description: Exception is thrown when attempting to export data from the attached report.
OB: When trying to export data from a table that contains a highlight rule and a map rule in the group row, an exception is thrown.
EB: No exception should be thrown during the export process when the report contains a table with a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row. The export operation should proceed smoothly without errors.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Add a table to the report that includes a group row with a highlight rule and a map rule. 
2. Preview the attached report. 
3. Attempt to export the data from the table.
